title: Google\Cloud\DataCatalog\V1\EntryOverview
name: EntryOverview
description:
Entry overview fields for rich text descriptions of entries.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.EntryOverview

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.overview
params.description: Entry overview with support for rich text. The overview must only contain Unicode characters, and should be formatted using HTML. The maximum length is 10 MiB as this value holds HTML descriptions including encoded images. The maximum length of the text without images is 100 KiB.

methods.name: getOverview
methods.description:
